name: Everdown
description:
Explore and survive in the Spider-people's web-like tunnels, dropping lower and lower into their labyrinthine domain.

In each level one nest contains the key to unlock the exit. Destroy the nest, take the key and find the trapdoor. Survive using the potions of health and mana you will find in chests throughout the narrow passages of the underground catacombs.

Use your staff to fire bolts of lightning to vanquish your foes. Knock back your enemies with a repelling blast and use this power to rebound off the walls and floors to reach the higher points.

Mastering the angles required to navigate the Spider-people's deep dwellings will take practice and be careful to manage your mana, it does regenerate over time but slowly!

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Q - Use Mana Potion
E - Use Health Potion
Space - Jump
Escape - Main Menu
Left Mouse Button - Fire Lightning Bolt
Right Mouse Button - Repel/Rebound

A roguelite action game made in 2 weeks for the Roguelike Jam May 2022

The theme for the jam was "Web".

I incorporated the theme in the use of spiders as enemies but also in the way that the levels are generated in a web-like layout.

All Art, Music and Programming by TheChae
Made using Godot, Aseprite, Audacity and Cakewalk
With thanks to IzzyBlue and Willfido for all the encouragement!
